projects.title: Snap-It Card Generator
projects.description: CLI tool that allows teachers and parents to generate picture cards for kids to use with colored snap-it blocks from images online. Made for my younger sister using Python.

projects.title: Cassetteify
projects.description: A web application inspired by the popular Receiptify that displays a user's top 10 popular artists from Spotify. Built with Flask and the Spotify API.

projects.title: resume-from-gsheets
projects.description: A web application that generates a fully formatted resume (in PDF and regular HTML format) from a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Built with Flask, Google Sheets API, and weasyprint to convert HTML to PDF.

projects.title: Student Loan Information
projects.description: Website built for Citibank's WIT one-week program final project. The website displays information concerning student loans. Built with Bootstrap. I developed the student loan map by parsing data from howmuch.net and displaying using D3.js.

projects.title: Termina (API)
projects.description: The backend for Termina, a web application that uses your Spotify data and machine learning to classify you into one of 12 character archetypes (based in a post-modern, cyberpunk world where an AI has taken over, of course). Made with scikit-learn, Flask, and the Spotify API, for Uncommon Hacks, where the full project won most creative hack. Frontend (made by team) was built in React and designed in Figma.

projects.title: The Sidekick: Not in the books
projects.description: Data story written for student publication Coppell Student Media as an explainer on the state of the Coppell ISD budget. Won honorable mention for best NSPA multimedia story. Visualizations built with D3.js, jQuery, and enter-view.

projects.title: Visualizing COVID
projects.description: A series of visualizations exploring the COVID-19 pandemic. Made using Python and Plotly.

projects.title: I'm 16. Here's why I organized for Bernie Sanders. For Mic.com
projects.description: Article written for Mic.com detailing my work early during the 2020 election season after Bernie Sanders dropped out of the Democratic primary.
